I cannot find my spectacles, everything looks like a blur.
The letters are too small. Is there a way to make them big like a billboard?
There is a glare on the screen from the tubelight. I need to move to the balcony.
My eyes are watering today. I think I have conjunctivitis.
I am reading '4' but it might be 'A'. It is very fuzzy.
Wait, let me ask my grandson to read this. I left my glasses in the bathroom.
The screen is too bright! It is hurting my eyes. How do I dim it?
I have cataracts, beta. Colors look different to me. Is the button green or grey?
I am using a magnifying glass but my hand is shaking.
Is the number 8 or is it 0? It looks like a laddoo.
One eye is closed because I just put eye drops. Give me 5 minutes.
I can see a picture of a cat, but no text. Where is the text?
The font is dancing. Maybe my sugar level is low.
I am trying to squint but it is still not clear.
Can you read it for me? I trusted you with my eyes closed.
My glasses broke yesterday. I am wearing my wife's glasses.
It is too dark in here. Let me open the curtains.
I think there is a smudge of oil on the screen right over the number.
Do I need 3D glasses for this? It looks double.
I am colorblind. You said press the red button, but I see only grey.
Hello? You sound like you are underwater.
Speak louder! My hearing aid battery is dying.
There is a whistling sound on the line. Are you near a train?
I can hear you but there is an echo. Echo... echo...
Wait, let me put the phone on the other ear. This one is blocked.
Did you say TeamViewer or Teen Deewar? Speak clearly.
The volume button is stuck. I cannot hear anything.
Are you whispering? Why are you whispering? Is it a secret?
I hear a lot of typing sounds. Are you playing a game?
Your voice is breaking like an old radio.
Hold on, I will put you on speaker... hello?
I think the signal is weak. Stand near a window.
Did you say 50 rupees or 50 lakhs? Big difference!
My phone speaker has dust in it. Let me blow into it.
I am hard of hearing. Can you shout a little?
Don't shout! You scared me. Speak normally.
I hear music in the background. Are you at a party?
The line is crossed. I can hear someone else talking.
Say that again? A truck just went by.
I am pressing the phone to my ear but I hear nothing.
Who are you again? The electricity board or the bank?
I forgot why we are talking. Did you call me or did I call you?
My memory is not what it used to be. Did I already give you the OTP?
I am getting confused. Too many numbers.
Wait, let me write this down in my diary. Where is my pen...
I thought you said you were Ramesh. Now you are Suresh?
Why do I need to download an app to receive money? In my time, we used cheques.
Is this the same thing my nephew warned me about?
I am feeling dizzy with all these instructions. Slow down.
I don't understand technology. Can I just mail you cash?
Did I leave the gas on? Oh god, let me check.
I typed the number but forgot to press Enter. Should I do it now?
Which bank is this? I have accounts in all of them.
Are you a robot? You sound like a robot.
I think I pressed the wrong button. Now it shows a picture of a monkey.
Do I click Yes or No? It asks do you want to uninstall.
I am scared. What if I delete my photos?
My grandson said never to share the PIN. Are you my grandson?
I am 82 years old. Have some patience.
I think I need to take my medicine first. My head is spinning.
Shhh! My wife is sleeping. She will kill me if I wake her.
My grandson is crying for chocolate. Hold on.
The doorbell is ringing. It must be the milkman.
My daughter is calling on the other line. Should I pick up?
My dog is barking at the postman. Tommy! Stop it!
I have to go, my serial is starting.
My son just walked in. Should I give the phone to him?
Someone is shouting outside. I think there is a fight.
My wife is asking who I am talking to. She thinks it's a girlfriend!
The maid is sweeping the floor. The noise is too much.
I have to pick up my granddaughter from school in 5 minutes.
My neighbor Sharmaji is here for tea. Can we talk later?
I am hiding in the bathroom so my family doesn't hear.
My bahu is shouting at me. One minute.
The baby just threw up. Oh god, what a mess.
My son is a lawyer. He usually handles this.
I need to feed the cat. She is scratching my leg.
My wife says you are a scammer. She is very suspicious.
The panditji has come for puja. I cannot talk now.
Everyone is sleeping. Whisper please.
The pressure cooker is whistling! I need to turn off the gas!
I just spilled tea on my kurta! It is burning!

I dropped the phone under the sofa. I cannot reach it.
There is a monkey on my balcony! Shoo! Shoo!
The fan is making a loud noise. Krrr-krrr-krrr.

I am in the market. It is very crowded here.
It is raining heavily. The roof is leaking.
